titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Rush Rhees, [11. 4. 1949]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Ã–NB (Autogr. 1286/20-3); Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I'm flying to Vienna today. Thanks for your kind letter. I'm in a hurry, feeling stupid & tired, so I'll just say that I'm thinking of you with the old feelings.
I intend to stay in Vienna 4 weeks & then stay in England for a while dictating a M.S. Forgive this queer letter.
